title: HTTP Delete
description: In this lab, we will explore the `XMLHttpRequest` web API and learn how to make a `DELETE` request to a given URL using JavaScript. We will create a function called `httpDelete` that takes in a URL, a callback function, and an optional error function as parameters. The function will use `XMLHttpRequest` to send a `DELETE` request to the provided URL and handle the response using the callback function.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
